entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
